name: KAISER (itch)
description:
Dive deep in this thrilling and nervous cyber-pirate-themed bullet hell, where you have to dodge many different patterns shot by numerous cyber-aquatic enemies and use the restricted space at your advantage to progress through 3 levels with their own mechanic. 

This game can be played in WASD, with arrows or with a controller (recommended).
- LVL 1 : You can move the plateform by going on its sides.
- LVL 2 : The plateform moves on its own (like a famous DVD animation huh ?)
- LVL 3 : You need to activate the four pillars by going on them with the plateform to trigger the Boss.

The game pros :

 - Various enemies with each one having his own unique pattern to dodge.

 - 3 levels with position-based challenge and their unique twists. 

- A final boss willing to sink you down (no, for real, this is hard). 

- Swordfishes. 

- An OST here to make you feel like you’re a bullet hell god on his way to heaven (made by Ønym on Soundcloud). 

- Stunning visuals made to really highlight your experience (no seriously, it highlight everything). 

- More swordfishes. 

The game cons :

- Cons-what ? Did not find any of these. 

The Team : 

Quentin “Asakim” Gautier : Lead Project, Game Designer, Pattern Designer, Level Designer (1 and 2), UI Designer. 

André “Sneakysunset” Lauzier : Unity Developper, Game Designer, Pattern Designer Level Designer (3). 

Guillaume “LeSelDiscret” Lebreton : Blender 3D Artist, Texture Artist, Bullet Artist, Character Designer, Monster Designer, Game Designer. 

Ønym : Composer, Sound Designer, Shader Artist, Game Designer, Seagull Designer.

Audio Engine: FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
